document.full_text: at least 150 people were wounded as yemeni security forces tried to break up a rally in the red sea city of hudaida demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's rule, a doctor and witnesses said on wednesday.
document.title: clashes in yemen protest wound at least 150: medic
lines_and_colors: at least 150 people were wounded as yemeni security forces tried to break up a rally in the red sea city of hudaida demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's rule, a doctor and witnesses said on wednesday.
